front.title: Local and Indirect Registration for Anchoring Handoffs

abstract.t: In wide area deployment, the handoff latencies due to latencies inMobile IP registrations, delay incurred due to setting up of dynamickeys, and latencies in setting up secure Tunnels could be high. Thisdocument proposes enchantments to reduce the latencies involved insuch handoffs. It proposes enhancements to facilitate localregistration, anchoring, and global indirect registration.
